page.description: The label for the minimum value row in the Grid.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Minimum value label]* property defines what is shown in the minimum value row of the Grid Component. The minimum row is only shown when the *[ui:Minimum]* property in the [Summary values] section for one or more fields has been checked.
The default value of *[ui:Minimum value label]* is "Minimum".
